sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Card, Icon, Image, Button } from 'semantic-ui-react' const ItemCard = (props) => { console.log(props) const {addToCart} = props console.log(addToCart) return ( {props.title} Краткое описание {props.price} < Button onClick={addToCart()} >Добавить в корзину ) } export default ItemCard;
